data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Maranhão, Brazil a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maranhão, Brazil
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Maranhão, Brazil from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in Maranhão, Brazil.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Maranhão.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Maranhão to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Turiwara people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, of the 4,259,866 people in the state of Maranhão who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Maranhão, Brazil be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maranhão, Brazil has a population of 6,569,700.

We estimate Maranhão has 1,638,431 people who might know Jesus, 4,259,866 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 671,404 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Maranhão that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.
